"Real property" means all interests in land or in buildings or improvements
"Reservation" means both the Saint Regis Mohawk Indian Tribe Reservation as
"Tribal Clerk" means the elected official responsible for, among other thin
"Tribal Court" means the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribal Court.
"Tribal Member" means an enrolled member of the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe.
"Tribe" means the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe.
"Willmaker" is a person who makes a Will.
